title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds | Launch Trailer

author: Epic Games
description:
► Buy Borderlands 4 Now: https://epic.gm/borderlands4

A roll of the dice, a flip of a card, a spin of the bullets in a chamber—these are among the random chances that fascinate C4SH, the first of two new DLC Vault Hunters coming to Borderlands 4.
Revealed during the Borderlands 4 panel at Tokyo Game Show 2025, C4SH is included in the first Story Pack, Mad Ellie and the Vault of the Damned, which is planned to launch in Q1 2026. This Story Pack is one of many additions outlined in our Post-Launch Roadmap, and features multiple main and side missions set in a new zone of Kairos, the brand-new Vault Hunter C4SH, new gear to earn, and a bunch of new cosmetics to collect.

Here are the ways you can add C4SH to your Vault Hunter roster when he's available in Q1 2026:
🎲 Own (or upgrade to) the Borderlands 4 Super Deluxe Edition
🎲 Own the Vault Hunter Pack (included in Super Deluxe Edition)
🎲 Own Story Pack 1: Mad Ellie and the Vault of the Damned (included in Vault Hunter Pack)
title: Borderlands 4 | Vault Hunter Teaser: C4SH

author: Epic Games
description:

title: RAVEN2 | Release Date Reveal
